title: Competition of interest groups in pluralism

content.prompt: A pluralist system is characterized by which of the following?

choices.label: Competition among interest groups over public policy
Negotiations among groups that have governmental support
Considerations of only those interests that reflect plural ethnicities
The control of interest groups over implementation and policy

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
